amendment.description: To require a report on investments of the Armed Forces in research on energetics.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3750 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3750 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5900; text: CR S5900) To require a report on investments of the Armed Forces in research on energetics.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3750 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3750 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
